page.title: 14Marconi in Chelmsford (2)
page.content: The{Marconi Radar Company Ltd}(MRSL) manufactures a wide range of civil and military ground, airborne and mobile radar systems,together with receiving and plotting equipment. The{Marconi College}established at Frinton in 1901, is at Springfield. Many courses of training in equipment usage are available here for customers' engineers. The{Marconi Research}establishment located at Baddow, undertakes pure research projects for any part of the {GEC Combine,}to which the Marconi firm now belongs.
